data.title: Great shop in downtown Longmont!
data.text: I try to stop here any time I'm downtown.  They always have items on sale.  High-quality merchandise.  Low-key sales people.

data.title: Local shirts and hats that are unique
data.text: This is a nice friendly local shop that is mostly clothing. They do have some nice local t shirts and hats  that I haven't seen elsewhere that are Longmont specific. Good quality and comfortable.  Its a change to show your local pride.

data.title: Pleasant outfitters shop on Main St.
data.text: An outdoor gear shop, especially clothes, not cheap, but seems not more expensive than REI in Boulder, and they do have a sale rack.  Pleasant staff, pleasant shop

data.title: Love this place!
data.text: I am all about shopping local so I love that we have an outdoor store in Longmont. As to be expected, some things can be a little overpriced but on the flip side they have some AMAZING deals as well. I have gotten multiple types of gear for discounted amounts just by going when they have their sales and promotions. The staff is extremely friendly and helpful and NEVER pressure you to purchase anything. Highly recommend to anyone going through Longmont or those that want to shop a more local place. I've gotten a large array of things from this store, winter jacket, rain jacket, bathing suit shorts, hates, wool socks, this place really does have it all!

data.title: Great store
data.text: I have frequented the store since they opened and have always managed to find something I like. For the size store, they have a nice selection of outdoor gear. Not a place to find hiking boots, but hiking and outdoor clothing is their speciality. Shop the sale rack for some good deals.

data.title: Decent Store
data.text: I like keeping things local and that would be the main reason I would shop here for outdoor gear. That said, I've been a member of REI for years and it is still my go-to place for this type of gear, clothing, etc.

data.title: Great outdoor store
data.text: Excellent, individual service for our hiking needs.  After finding weather conditions challenging, Old Town helped us with some great additions for the hiking we would be doing the next week.  Awesome store with great service.

data.title: Great place for quality casual clothing.
data.text: This is a great place to find quality clothing for hiking, biking, or any other outdoor adventure.  Having said that, I even found a neat dress for a cruise that worked perfectly after I got a sunburn because the cotton was so soft.  I have also bought casual button-down shirts for young men as gifts and they have been very well-received.  The outside of the store always has interesting sights to stop and see, such as a giant goose, tree stumps, and great clearance racks.  An added bonus is that the proprietor is always giving back to the community.  Our community is lucky to have Old Town Outfitters and I hope to see them for many years to come!

data.title: Charming Downtown store
data.text: The staff is always friendly and helpful at this store. They carry high-quality clothing that is comfortable and appropriate for the ever-changing weather in Colorado. The store is located near other charming shops and restaurants in downtown Longmont.
